alert.note: Alert for Mississippi (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 11:25AM CST until January 13 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Missouri...Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Cairo. .Recent heavy rainfall and snow melt will continue to keep water levels on the lower Ohio River in or near minor flood this week. For the Ohio River...including Olmsted Lock and Dam, Cairo...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Cairo. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 40.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs affecting mainly agricultural bottomland and low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 40.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 40.3 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
